alert.note: Alert for Northern Bristol; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 8:22PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Norfolk, west central Plymouth and north central Bristol Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 821 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Walpole, or near Norwood, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Brockton, Taunton, Norwood, Stoughton, Bridgewater, Walpole, Mansfield, Middleborough, Easton, Norton, Sharon, Foxborough, East Bridgewater, Raynham, Medfield, Norfolk, Wrentham, Lakeville, Halifax, and West Bridgewater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Northern Bristol; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
